EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08.
VESSEL, 13 PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE
IN 33-23N 011-49E AT 082230Z DEC. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
